Question
========

Of 8 subjects, before and after a given exertion of force, the heart rate is measured. We want to test whether the average heart rate before and after the effort is equal. Of the 8 differences between pre- and post-measurement the mean is 24 and the standard deviation is 28. The value of the test size of the paired T test is then

Answerlist
----------

* 2.42
* 2.89
* 3.52
* 12.94

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 2.42: Correct
* 2.89: Incorrect
* 3.52: Incorrect
* 12.94: Incorrect
